name: Books, Periodicals, and Newspapers
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Wholesale manufacturers and distributors of books, periodicals,
magazines, journals, newspapers, pamphlets and educational
materials. Newspaper agencies are also included.
For wholesale printers or publishers of books, periodicals, and
magazines, use MCC 2741.
For retailers that sell books, use MCC 5942.
